OpenSim.Services.ConfigurationService.ConfigurationService Class Reference

This is an application plugin so that it loads asap as it is used by many things (IService modules especially). More...

virtual string Name [get]

Detailed Description

This is an application plugin so that it loads asap as it is used by many things (IService modules especially).
